body:
MXNet is a deep learning framework designed for both efficiency and flexibility. https://github.com/dmlc/mxnet

- [x] Add `dmlc/dmlc-core`.
- [x] Add `cub` (#3584)
- [x] Add `dmlc/ps-lite` (PR https://github.com/dmlc/ps-lite/pull/94 has been pending for 7 days without response. Patch it in Spack.)
- [x] Add `dmlc/nnvm`
- [x] Add `dmlc/mshadow`.
- [x] Add `dmlc/dlpack`.
- [x] Patch cmake file in ps-lite to generate the correct lib name. (Patch have been done in spack and waited to be merged in upstream https://github.com/dmlc/ps-lite/pull/95 https://github.com/dmlc/ps-lite/pull/98 .)
- [x] Patch `dmlc-core` CMakefile to include `make/dmlc.mk`.
- [x] Install `make/mshadow.mk` into destination.
- [x] Patch `dmlc/nnvm` to build it statically and install lib and header to destination. (See PR https://github.com/dmlc/nnvm/pull/146)
- [x] Match commit version for all submodules of mxnet release 0.10.0.
- [x] Add cpu- mxnet without OpenCV support.
- [x] Add cpu- mxnet with OpenCV support.
- [x] Add gpu- mxnet.
- [x] Add MXNet python binding `py-mxnet`.
title: Add a package: dmlc/mxnet.
